FFDENetwork

Class FFDEPublisher

  • java.lang.Object
    • FFDENetwork.FFDEPublisher
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    @ThreadSafe
public class FFDEPublisher
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Created by JM on 25.03.2016. This class is a container for a set of channels to modules that subscribe a certain set of data. (ex. filtering module would probably want to subscribe IMU readings) Every update is automatically transmitted to all subscribers in a separate thread.
